question: Recently, India has been ranked 177 among 180 countries in the Environmental Performance Index (EPI), 2018. The index has been developed by Yale University and Columbia University in collaboration with the:
explanation: The Environmental Performance Index (EPI) has been developed by Yale University and Columbia University in collaboration with the World Economic Forum and the Joint Research Centre. Environmental Performance Index (EPI) is calculated on the basis of data gathered from 24 individual metrics of environmental performance.
